pageContext.claim: “And there are a lot of campaign finance violations there. There's no way you can do what he's doing. You know, you go into a town, you give somebody a contribution, two days later the guy comes, 'I'd like to support Mini Mike Bloomberg.' There's something strange with that whole deal.”
pageContext.analysis: Without evidence, Trump accuses former Mayor Mike Bloomberg of campaign violations. There is no limit that an individual may spend on their own campaign, as Trump well knows.
